text:
In today’s video we’re taking you to Quebec’s
Eastern Townships, specifically Sutton!

Neither Sam nor I had been here before, but
this destination proved to have it all, from

unique accommodations and adventure activities
to beautiful hiking trails and an emerging
foodie scene.

We spent 2 days exploring the area in partnership
with Tourisme Québec and Merrell Canada,
and here’s a look at what we got up to!

Good morning guys we are heading out this
morning.
We are going to spend the day in nature.

That is the plan but we're going to need some
food.

We're going to need some energy so we're just
heading to Sutton going to grab some lunch.
And then yes hitting the road.

Hitting the road and doing a whole bunch of
different things today.

Our first stop was La Rumeur Affamée, which
is a gourmet food shop right in the heart
of Sutton specializing in local products.

We dropped by to pick up a few items for a
picnic since we had an action-packed day ahead
of us.

And being the foodies that we are, we couldn’t
resist sampling a few cheese and caramel spreads
while we were in there!

from le lac charlevoire in de saint paul let

us have a taste of that and see how you like
